dcterms:creator: Vern R. Walker
Jaromír Savelka
Kevin D. Ashley
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sentences from 50 fact-finding decisions issued by the U.S. Board of Veterans’ Appeals related to claims for service-related PTSD, tagged with rhetorical roles.
dcterms:title: Veterans Claims Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jaromír Savelka
Kevin D. Ashley
dcterms:description: A dataset of 316 court decisions annotated for high-level functional parts and issue-specific parts, used to evaluate segmentation of court opinions.
dcterms:title: Court Decisions Segmentation Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mohammad Hassan Falakmasir
Kevin D. Ashley
dcterms:description: A corpus of 172 trade secret misappropriation cases labeled by legal experts with applicable factors that strengthen or weaken a claim.
dcterms:title: The Trade Secrets Factors Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jaromír Savelka
Huihui Xu
Kevin D. Ashley
dcterms:description: A dataset of sentences from court opinions that elaborate on the meaning of vague statutory terms, classified into categories based on their usefulness for statutory interpretation.
dcterms:title: The Statutory Interpretation Dataset
